snippet: Thousands clashed with the police on Saturday in protest of a plan that its opponents say would force the relocation of up to 40,000 and dispossess them of their land rights.
lead_paragraph: Thousands clashed with the police on Saturday in protest of a plan that its opponents say would force the relocation of up to 40,000 and dispossess them of their land rights.

headline.main: Bedouins in Israel Protest Plan to Regulate Settlement
headline.print_headline: Bedouins in Israel Protest Plan to Regulate Settlement
